title: Presaved Radio for eurotrucksimulator 2
description:
Hi guys.
This is my beautiful radio stations you actually enjoy while you are driving euro truck simulator 2.
Actually I have  just extracted these Radio stations form GTA San Andreas so that you can enjoy while trucking.
Now you don't have to connect to the internet and listen to radio stations and I know most of you folks play this game while offline to avoid activation.

Installation;
 1. Just copy these files (MP3) to your music folder in My Documents>Euro-truck      simulator 2> Music.
2. That's it!
3.Then load your game, get onto the truck and play the radio you want.
You can start form any station you want just the way you do tour saved mp3s.
4. Enjoy.
